cards.flavorText: Fire is the test of gold; adversity of strong men. - Seneca, "On Providence," trans. Basara
cards.name: Soltari Priest
cards.text:
Protection from red
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

cards.name: Albino Troll
cards.text:
Echo {1}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
{1}{G}: Regenerate Albino Troll.

cards.name: Dissipate

rulings.text: The card does not go to the graveyard before being exiled.
If the spell is not countered (because the spell it targets can’t be countered), then it does not get exiled.

cards.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

cards.flavorText: The chill, to him who breathed it, drew / Down with his blood, till all his heart was cold. —Alfred, Lord Tennyson, Idyls of the King
cards.name: Black Knight
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)

cards.flavorText: Everything in Nature contains all the powers of Nature. - Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Compensation"
cards.name: Wall of Blossoms
cards.text:
Defender
When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.flavorText: One pain is lessened by another's anguish. —William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet
cards.name: Fireslinger
cards.text: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Drain Life

rulings.text: Cost reducers can be used to reduce the X part of the mana cost.
You may gain up to the total toughness of the creature even if it was already damaged.

cards.text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

cards.name: Aura of Silence

rulings.text: Aura of Silence affects all opponents in a multiplayer game.

cards.text:
Artifact and enchantment spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast.
Sacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.name: Forbid
cards.text:
Buyback—Discard two cards. (You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Counter target spell.

cards.name: Spike Feeder
cards.text:
Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

cards.flavorText: As if his chest had been a mortar, he burst his hot heart's shell upon it. —Herman Melville, Moby Dick
cards.name: Mogg Fanatic

rulings.text: Once Mogg Fanatic has dealt and been dealt combat damage, it’s too late to activate its ability before it’s destroyed.

cards.text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: It deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.flavorText: When good men die their goodness does not perish, / But lives though they are gone. —Euripides, Termenidae, trans. Morgan
